text: Yikhni kur'yery skazaly, "Roblyatʹ vy sumnivy pro BOHA; Initiator neba ta zemli? Vin zaproshuye vas tilʹky prostyty vashi hrikhy, ta shchob daty vy inshyy shans vykupovuyete sebe." Vony skazaly, "Vy ne vyhlyadayete bilʹsh nizh humans yak ny, khto zakhochutʹ vidkhylyty nas z shlyakhu nashi batʹky zvychayno obozhnyuvaly. Pokazhitʹ nam deyakyy hlybokyy avtorytet
